Chimu Trading | Data Platform Engineer | Full-time | REMOTE

We are a small startup with the ambition of analysing football (soccer) data in more depth and producing predictions with more precision that anyone else in the world. We are looking for someone to take charge of our data back-end, including ingestion of source data, database administration and delivery to the data science staff.

We based our workflow on Python/Django, PostgreSQL and AWS, so these skills are a must. Full advert here: https://chimutrading.github.io/

The post is available immediately. Please send a short cover letter, a CV and some code samples (ideally a GitHub profile) and we will be in touch. Informal enquiries are also welcome.
